snippet.title: HINGE - VR Horror official Trailer. Physics-based interactions and gameplay
snippet.description:
HINGE is a VR horror game that takes place in a nightmarish building transported to another dimension. 

Wishlist on Steam:
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1429640/HINGE_Episode_1/

Follow us for up-to-the-minute updates:
Twitter: https://twitter.com/vr_arcadia
Discord: https://discord.gg/hDJd9DxAqr
